img_summary: The image displays an equipment menu from a video game, focusing on a rare item called "Turtle Treasure." This item has a high Qi cost and offers a special ability named "Skyward," which allows the player to take the form of Turtle Treasure, ride a mallet upside-down, and ignite powder to soar upwards, crushing enemies upon landing. The item is equipped by pressing "F" in combat and increases damage dealt by heavy attacks that cost 3 or 4 focus points. The menu also shows a list of spirits on the left, a demonstration video of the ability, and various player stats on the right, such as health, stamina, and attack power. The interface includes options for self-advancement, relics, inventory, journal, and settings.
